{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\cocoartf949\cocoasubrtf460 {\fonttbl\f0\fnil\fcharset0 GillSans;\f1\fnil\fcharset0 LucidaGrande;} {\colortbl;\red255\green255\blue255;\red204\green102\blue102;} {\*\listtable{\list\listtemplateid1\listhybrid{\listlevel\levelnfc23\levelnfcn23\leveljc2\leveljcn2\levelfollow0\levelstartat1\levelspace360\levelindent0{\*\levelmarker \{check\}}{\leveltext\leveltemplateid0\'02\'05.;}{\levelnumbers\'01;}}{\listname ;}\listid1}} {\*\listoverridetable{\listoverride\listid1\listoverridecount0\ls1}} \pard\tx560\tx1120\tx1680\tx2240\tx2800\tx3360\tx3920\tx4480\tx5040\tx5600\tx6160\tx6720\ql\qnatural\pardirnatural
\f0\fs72 \cf0 When dealing with spatialization, the workflow comprises a number of steps. We propose to conceptually organize them according to six layers according to levels of abstraction. Each layer provides services to the layer above it and receives services from the layer below it.\ \ The paper presents the layers, and the communication streams passing sound and control data between layers. Prototype implementations are discussed combining:\ \ \pard\tx220\tx720\tx1120\tx1680\tx2240\tx2800\tx3360\tx3920\tx4480\tx5040\tx5600\tx6160\tx6720\li1110\fi-1110\ql\qnatural\pardirnatural \ls1\ilvl0\cf0 {\listtext \f1 \uc0\u10003 \f0 }\cf2 Jamoma\cf0 - A modular framework for Max.\ \pard\tx220\tx720\tx1120\tx1680\tx2240\tx2800\tx3360\tx3920\tx4480\tx5040\tx5600\tx6160\tx6720\li720\fi-720\ql\qnatural\pardirnatural \ls1\ilvl0\cf0 {\listtext \f1 \uc0\u10003 \f0 }The \cf2 ICST Ambisonics Tools\cf0 for Max.\ \pard\tx220\tx720\tx1120\tx1680\tx2240\tx2800\tx3360\tx3920\tx4480\tx5040\tx5600\tx6160\tx6720\li1120\fi-1120\ql\qnatural\pardirnatural \ls1\ilvl0\cf0 {\listtext \f1 \uc0\u10003 \f0 }\cf2 SpatDIF\cf0 - Spatial Sound Description Interchange format.\ {\listtext \f1 \uc0\u10003 \f0 }\cf2 Holo-Edit\cf0 - A graphical editor of sound trajectories.\ }

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\cocoartf949\cocoasubrtf460 {\fonttbl\f0\fnil\fcharset0 GillSans;} {\colortbl;\red255\green255\blue255;\red204\green102\blue102;} \pard\tx560\tx1120\tx1680\tx2240\tx2800\tx3360\tx3920\tx4480\tx5040\tx5600\tx6160\tx6720\ql\qnatural\pardirnatural
\f0\b\fs96 \cf2 ABSTRACT \b0 \cf0 \ \pard\tx560\tx1120\tx1680\tx2240\tx2800\tx3360\tx3920\tx4480\tx5040\tx5600\tx6160\tx6720\ql\qnatural\pardirnatural
\fs72 \cf0 We propose a multi-layer structure to mediate essential components in sound spatialization. This approach will facilitate artistic work with spatialization systems, a process which currently lacks structure, flexibility, and interoperability. \ \pard\tx560\tx1120\tx1680\tx2240\tx2800\tx3360\tx3920\tx4480\tx5040\tx5600\tx6160\tx6720\ql\qnatural\pardirnatural
\fs62 \cf0 \ }
